name: Umbra - First Game Jam
description:
A game built in 2 days over summer break by Thomas Silloway and a good friend.  We held our own game jam, which was a first for both of us.  Had a ton of fun and looking forward to doing it again!  Let us know what you think by leaving a comment below.

Asset packs:

2D Dungeon pixel art Tileset

Pipoya free rpg character sprites 32x32

Western Audio Pack

Classic Footstep SFX

Horror Elements SFX

Futura Font

Third party plugins:

Eazy Sound Manager

Lean Tween
